name: Submarine 2000
description:
Submarine 2000 is a 90s-inspired underwater exploration/survival game created in 14 days for the itch.io 32-bit game jam 2022.

Avoid underwater mines, use torpedoes to fend off sharks, and try to reach a depth of 100 meters.

Controls:

-W + S to move.

-A + D to turn.

-Space to shoot torpedoes.

RookRules' stream:

https://clips.twitch.tv/TangibleGeniusBunnyWholeWheat-Ex9s4MivTkD7n-ML
